name: Webpage HTML Export
description: Exports an obsidian document as an HTML document / webpage / website (correctly!). Also has interactive embedded dark / light theme toggle, and document outline.
author: Nathan George
updateNote:
- Removed both the old and the new export method
- Added a new method which runs in the background AND supports all features
- Added better visual progress indicator
- A few bug fixes
- Report issues on github :)
